block.p: KOENIG-Murray. Of the Bronx and Aventura, FL., on May 13. Judge of New York City Criminal Court, Acting Justice New York Supreme Court. Beloved husband of Ruth; father of Joshua, Neva and Zachary; grandfather of Ayla and Miranda; brother of Dorothy Bleefeld. Funeral services at The Riverside, 76th St. and Amsterdam Ave., Tuesday, 11:45 AM. For information, contact 718-853-4000.
